summary: Robes of the Black Hand as seen in oblivion
descriptionHtml:
[color=#7E2217][u][i][size=200]ROBES OF THE BLACK HAND[/i][/size][/u]


[quote=\"\"]And you, you are a killer. A taker of life. A harvester of souls. Your work, your deathcraft, pleases the Night Mother. And so, I come to you with an offering. An opportunity... - Lucian Lachance[/color][/quote]
 

~ This addon for skyrim brings back the robes of the ruthless and feared Black Hand!!! 

~ The robes can be found in a unique chest located on the coast near the dawnstar brotherhood sanctuary, i\'ve uploaded a photo of its location in the image\'s incase no one wants to search for it...make sure to bring some lockpicks as its locked up tight.

~The robes have the same sinister stats as they appeared in oblivion!!

~ The Black Hand robes are made up of a hood, the robes and glove\'s. The hood and robes have the original stats from oblivion and the gloves have a weaker set of the same stats, when all whorn they provide a nice set of stat boosts.
author: DarkLordDan
